/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy over the road. A few pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the scene. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, hinting at the bustling city life. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the vast expanse. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the vibrant colors of the scene.
